definition: fearless/not worried (by setbacks or difficulties)/even if/even though
(negative prefix)/not/no
surname Pa
to be afraid/to fear/to dread/to be unable to endure/perhaps
lit. newborn calves do not fear tigers (idiom)/fig. the young are fearless
pinyin: chu1 sheng1 niu2 du2 bu4 pa4 hu3

definition: fearing nothing in Heaven or Earth (idiom)/fearless
pinyin: tian1 bu4 pa4 di4 bu4 pa4

definition: fearing nothing in Heaven or Earth (idiom)/fearless
pinyin: tian1 bu4 pa4 di4 bu4 pa4

definition: fragrant wine fears no dark alley (idiom)/quality goods need no advertising
pinyin: jiu3 xiang1 bu4 pa4 xiang4 zi5 shen1

definition: lit. a dead pig doesn't fear scalding water (idiom)/fig. to be unaffected (by sth)/undaunted
pinyin: si3 zhu1 bu4 pa4 kai1 shui3 tang4

definition: True gold fears no fire. (idiom)
pinyin: zhen1 jin1 bu4 pa4 huo3 lian4

definition: see 初生之犢不畏虎|初生之犊不畏虎[chu1 sheng1 zhi1 du2 bu4 wei4 hu3]
pinyin: chu1 sheng1 zhi1 du2 bu4 pa4 hu3

definition: He who never wrongs others does not fear the knock in the night./Rest with a clear conscience.
pinyin: bu4 zuo4 kui1 xin1 shi4 , bu4 pa4 gui3 qiao1 men2
containing_words.word: 不做亏心事，不怕鬼敲门

definition: better to be safe than sorry (proverb)/to be prepared just in case
pinyin: bu4 pa4 yi1 wan4 , jiu4 pa4 wan4 yi1

definition: lit. don't worry about not knowing goods, but about comparing them (proverb)/fig. goods' (or person's) true value can only be determined through comparison
pinyin: bu4 pa4 bu4 shi2 huo4 , zhi3 pa4 huo4 bi3 huo4
containing_words.word: 不怕不识货，只怕货比货

definition: lit. don't worry about not knowing goods, but about comparing them (proverb)/fig. goods' (or person's) true value can only be determined through comparison
pinyin: bu4 pa4 bu4 shi2 huo4 , jiu4 pa4 huo4 bi3 huo4
containing_words.word: 不怕不识货，就怕货比货

definition: lit. it is not an official to be feared, but a person in direct control over sb (proverb)/fig. to be obliged to comply with people in authority
pinyin: bu4 pa4 guan1 , zhi3 pa4 guan3

definition: it's better to make slow progress than no progress at all (proverb)
pinyin: bu4 pa4 man4 , jiu4 pa4 zhan4

definition: a boneheaded teammate can do you more harm than the most formidable opponent (idiom)
pinyin: bu4 pa4 shen2 yi1 yang4 de5 dui4 shou3 , jiu4 pa4 zhu1 yi1 yang4 de5 dui4 you3
containing_words.word: 不怕神一样的对手，就怕猪一样的队友

definition: lit. the barefooted people are not afraid of those who wear shoes (idiom)/fig. the poor, who have nothing to lose, do not fear those in power
pinyin: guang1 jiao3 de5 bu4 pa4 chuan1 xie2 de5

sentences.english: The stars are not afraid to appear like fireflies。
sentences.chinese: 群星不怕显得象萤火那样。

sentences.english: She is really an aggressive lady.
sentences.chinese: 她真是个天不怕地不怕的女人。

sentences.english: She is really an aggressive lady.
sentences.chinese: 她真是个天不怕地不怕的女人。

sentences.english: A dead pig fears not scalding water.
Even though I walk through the darkest valley, I fear no evil.
sentences.chinese: 我虽然行过死萌的幽谷，也不怕遭害。

sentences.english: They are not afraid to break with convention.
I enjoy being made fun of. I enjoy making mistakes.
sentences.chinese: 我不怕被别人取笑，我不怕犯错。

sentences.english: I enjoy being made fun of. I enjoy making mistakes.
sentences.chinese: 我不怕被别人取笑，我不怕犯错。

sentences.english: As long as the road is right, not afraid Way away.
sentences.chinese: 只要路是对的，就不怕路远。

sentences.english: But whoso hearkeneth unto me shall dwell safely, and shall be quiet from fear of evil.
sentences.chinese: 惟有听从我的，必安然居住，得享安静，不怕灾祸。

sentences.english: I am not one who is afraid of difficulty.
Therefore, bumpy road ahead is not afraid, I am afraid that from the outset, the direction is going the wrong way.
sentences.chinese: 所以，不怕前路坎坷，只怕从一开始就走错了方向。

sentences.english: Being right half the time beats being half-right all the time.
sentences.chinese: 不怕半生皆是谬误，只怕一生似是而非。

sentences.english: And my own ways are under my own feet.
sentences.chinese: 我不怕天，也不怕地，自己的路儿在脚下。

sentences.english: And my own ways are under my own feet.
sentences.chinese: 我不怕天，也不怕地，自己的路儿在脚下。

sentences.english: He carried a dagger nine and a half inches long to determine whether or not the teacher was afraid to die.
sentences.chinese: 他身藏一把九寸半的利刃，想试试老师到底怕不怕死。
